summary: A fixed/more-accessible version of two previous modders\'s uploads.  No more need for Ebony Smithing perk!  Has four name/damage variants.
descriptionHtml:
Lollipop War-axes, edition 3: Now with multiple damages and no need for advanced smithing perks!

\"Starburst Lollipop\" / Iron, 8 damage:
1 firewood
4 Iron ingots
Temper with 1 Iron ingot

\"Menthol Lollipop\" / Orcish, 10 damage:
1 firewood
4 Orichalcum ingots
Temper with 1 Orichalcum ingot

\"Lollipop\" / Elven / True Candy, 12 damage:
1 firewood
5 Moon Sugars
Temper with 1 Moon Sugar

\"Jawbreaker Lollipop\" / Ebony, 15 damage:
1 firewood
4 Ebony ingots
Temper with 1 Ebony ingot
author: Aper
